A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This latest Star Wars installment is full of misguided slapstick that panders to family Christmas audiences who can't handle the depth of more complicated sci-fi dramas. There are several scenes that come off so cheesy they could be in the 1980s Bowie movie\, Labyrinth. Within the Star Wars saga this felt both abrasive and cheap.  This is a Star Wars for a dumber audience.
